titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the Earle of Essex's funerall.
titleStmt.author: Wild, John.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: J.W. [i.e. John Wild].
Verse - "And are these all the rites that must be done,".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob: 29"; after J. W.: "ild".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
